GE07bhg4c17u:2: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c17u:6: pūrvādhyāyānte yaḥ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya vartate kāma-cārataḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:7: na sa siddhim avāpnoti [Gītā 16.24] ity anena śāstrokta-vidhim utsṛjya
GE07bhg4c17u:9: tatra śāstram utsṛjya kāma-cāraṃ vinā śraddayā vartamānānāṃ kim adhikāro 'sti nāsti veti bubhutsayā 'rjuna uvāca ya iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:10: atra ca śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajanta ity
GE07bhg4c17u:11: anena śāstrārthaṃ buddhyā tam ullaṅghya vartamāno na gṛhyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:16: yajante sāttvikā devān ity ādy uttarānupapatteś ca |
GE07bhg4c17u:18: api tu kleśa-buddhy-ālasyād vā śāstrārtha-jñāne prayatnam akṛtvā kevalam
GE07bhg4c17u:19: ācāra-paramparā-vaśena śraddhayā kvacid devatārādhanādau pravartamānā gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c17u:25: tām eva viśeṣeṇa pṛcchati kiṃ sattvam |
GE07bhg4c17u:36: jñātvāpy aśraddhayā tam utsṛjya kāma-kāra-mātreṇa yat kiṃcid anutiṣṭhanti
GE07bhg4c17u:38: kecit tu śāstra-vidhiṃ jñātvā śraddadhānatayā tad-anusāreṇaiva niṣiddhaṃ varjayanto vihitam anutiṣṭhanti te sarva-puruṣārtha-yogyatvād devā iti pūrvādhyāyānte siddham |
GE07bhg4c17u:39: ye tu śāstrīyaṃ vidhim ālasyādi-vaśād upekṣya śraddadhānatayaiva vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa niṣiddhaṃ varjayanto vihitam anutiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c17u:42: śraddhā-pūrvakānuṣṭhāna-lakṣaṇena ca deva-sādharmyeṇānvitāḥ kim asureṣv antarbhavanti kiṃ vā deveṣv ity ubhaya-dharma-darśanād
GE07bhg4c17u:43: eka-koṭi-niścāyakādarśanāc ca sandihāno 'rjuna uvāca ya iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:44: ye pūrvādhyāye ta nirṇītā na devavac chāstrānusāriṇaḥ kintu śāstra-vidhiṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:46: kiṃ tu vṛddha-vyavahārānusāreṇa śraddhayānvitā yajante deva-pūjādikaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:50: he kṛṣṇa bhaktāvakarṣaṇa ! kiṃ sattvaṃ sāttvikī |
GE07bhg4c17u:53: kiṃ rajas tamo rājasī tāmsī ca |
GE07bhg4c17u:54: tathā sati rājasa-tāmasatvād asurās te sattvam ity ekā koṭiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:55: rajas tama ity aparā koṭir iti vibhāga-jñāpanāyāho-śabdaḥ ||17.1||
GE07bhg4c17u:57: atha saptadaśe vastu sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tathā |
GE07bhg4c17u:61: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim ||[Gītā 16.24]
GE07bhg4c17u:63: tatrāham idaṃ jijñāsa ity āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:65: utsṛjya kāma-cārato vartante kintu kāma-bhoga-rahitā eva śraddhayānvitāḥ santo yajante taop-yajña-jñāna-yajña-japa-yajñādikaṃ kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c17u:66: teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā sthitiḥ kim ālambanam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:71: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ vastu tāmasaṃ ca vivekataḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:75: vedam avajñāya yathecchā-cāriṇo veda-bāhyās tv āsurā iti
GE07bhg4c17u:78: ye janāḥ pāṭhato 'rthataś ca durgamaṃ vedaṃ viditvālasyādinā tad-vidhim utsṛjya
GE07bhg4c17u:79: lokācāra-jātayā śraddhayānvitāḥ santo devādīn yajante, teṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:81: sattvaṃ saṃśrayā teṣāṃ sthitir athavā rajas tamaḥ saṃśrayeti koṭi-dvayāvabodhāyāho-śabdo madhye niveśitaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c17u:83: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā |
GE07bhg4c17u:84: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu ||2||
GE07bhg4c17u:86: ayam arthaḥ śāstra-tattva-jñānataḥ pravartamānānāṃ parameśvara-pūjā-viṣayā sāttvikī ekavidhaiva bhavati śraddhā |
GE07bhg4c17u:88: yā śraddhā sā tu sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ceti trividhā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:92: svabhāvam anyathā kartuṃ samarthaṃ śāstrotthaṃ viveka-jñānam |
GE07bhg4c17u:94: ataḥ kevalaṃ pūrva-svabhāvena bhavantī śraddhā trividhā
GE07bhg4c17u:96: tām imāṃ trividhāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇv iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:97: tad uktaṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekeha kurunandana ity ādinā ||2||
GE07bhg4c17u:98: madhusūdanaḥ : ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya śraddhayā yajante te
GE07bhg4c17u:100: tatra ye sāttvikyā śraddhayānvitās te devāḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:102_0: ye tu rājasyā tāmasyā ca śraddhayānvitās te 'surā na śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante
GE07bhg4c17u:102_1: na vā tat-phalena yujyanta iti vivekenārjunasya sandeham apaninīṣuḥ śraddhā-bhedaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:103: yathā śraddhayānvitāḥ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajante sā dehināṃ svabhāvajā, janmāntara-kṛto
GE07bhg4c17u:105: sa tri-vidhaḥ sāttviko rājasas tāmasaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c17u:107: tri-vidhā bhavati sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ca |
GE07bhg4c17u:109: yā tv ārabdhe janmani śāstra-saṃskāra-mātrajā viduṣāṃ sā kāraṇaika-rūpatvād eka-rūpā sāttviky eva |
GE07bhg4c17u:118: anādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ dehināṃ nāsti atas teṣāṃ svabhāva-vaśāt tridhā bhavantīṃ tāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c17u:119: śrutvā ca devāsura-bhāvaṃ svayam evāvadhārayety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:120: viśvanāthaḥ : bho arjuna prathamaṃ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajatāṃ niṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:122: paścāt śāstra-vidhi-tyāgināṃ niṣṭhāṃ te vakṣyāmīty āha trividheti |
GE07bhg4c17u:125: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca trividheti |
GE07bhg4c17u:127: śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya ye śraddhayā devādīn yajante dehinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:128: sā teṣāṃ svabhāvajā bodhyā prāktanaḥ śubhāśubha-saṃskāraḥ svabhāvas tasmāj jātety
GE07bhg4c17u:131: saṃsārasya sāttvikatvādinā traividhyāt taj-jāta-śraddhāpi trividhety āha sāttvikītyādi
GE07bhg4c17u:133: sad-upadiṣṭa-śāstra-janyā viveka-saṃvit sā teṣāṃ nāsty ataḥ svabhāvajā śraddhā trividhā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:138: śraddhā-mayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yac-chraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c17u:139: śrīdharaḥ : nanu ca śraddhā sāttviky eva sattva-kāryatvena tvayaiva
GE07bhg4c17u:142: śamo damas titikṣejyā tapaḥ satyaṃ dayā smṛtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:143: tuṣṭis tyāgo 'spṛhā śraddhā hrīr dayā nirvṛttir dhṛtiḥ ||[BhP 11.25.2]
GE07bhg4c17u:149: rajas-tamo-yukta-puruṣāśrayatvena rajas-tamo-miśritatvena sattvasya traividhyāc chraddhāyāpi traividhyaṃ ghaṭate ity āhasattvānurūpeti |
GE07bhg4c17u:150: sattvānurūpā sattva-tāratamyānusāriṇī sarvasya vivekino 'vivekino lokasya śraddhā vikriata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:151: tad evāha yo yac chraddhaḥ yādṛśī śraddhā yasya |
GE07bhg4c17u:154: yaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvotkarṣeṇa sāttvika-śraddhayā yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ sa punas
GE07bhg4c17u:156: yas tu rajasa utkarṣeṇa rājasa-śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa punas tādṛśa eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:157: yas tu tamasa utkarṣeṇa tāmasa-śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa punas tādṛśa eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:159: śāstra-janita-viveka-jñāna-yuktānāṃ tu svabhāva-vijayena sāttvikī ekaiva śraddheti prakaraṇārthaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:166: tac ca kvacid udrikta-sattvam eva yathā devānām |
GE07bhg4c17u:172: tac ca śāstrīya-viveka-jñānenodbhūta-sattvaṃ rajas-tamasī abhibhūya kriyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:173: śāstrīya-viveka-vijñāna-śūnyasya tu sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya sattvānurūpā śraddhā sattva-vaicitryād vicitrā bhavati, sattva-pradhāne 'ntaḥ-karaṇe
GE07bhg4c17u:175: rajaḥ-pradhāne tasmin rājasī tamaḥ-pradhāne tu tasmiṃs tāmasīti
GE07bhg4c17u:176: | he bhārata mahā-kula-prasūta jñāna-nirateti vā śuddha-sāttvikatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:178: yat tvayā pṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ niṣṭā keti tatrottaraṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c17u:181: śraddhā-mayaḥ prācuryeṇāsmin śraddhā prakṛteti tat-prastuta-vacane mayaṭ |
GE07bhg4c17u:183: ato yo yac-chradho yā sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī vā śraddhā yasya sa eva śraddhānurūpa eva sa sāttviko rājasas tāmaso vā |
GE07bhg4c17u:185: viśvanāthaḥ : sattvam antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c17u:189: yac-chraddho yasmin yajanīye deve 'sure rākṣase vā śraddhāvān yo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:190: sa sa eva bhavati tat tac chabdenaiva vyapadiśyata ity arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c17u:193: tad-uditāyās tasyās traividhyaṃ siddhyed iti bhāvenāha sattvānurūpeti |
GE07bhg4c17u:194: sattvam antaḥkaraṇaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ tad-anurūpā sarvasya prāṇijātasya śraddhā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:198: ato 'yaṃ pūjya-pūjaka-rūpo laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ śraddhāmayas trividha-śraddhā-pracuro yaḥ puruṣo yac-chraddho yasmin pūjye devādau yakṣādau pretādau ca śraddhāvān bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:199: sa pūjako 'pi sa eva tat-tac-chabdena vyapadeśya pūjya-guṇavān pūjaka ity arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c17u:201: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c17u:202: śrīdharaḥ : sāttvikādi-bhedam eva kārya-bhedena prapañcayati yajanta iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:203: sāttvikā janāḥ sattva-prakṛtīn devān eva yajante pūjayanti |
GE07bhg4c17u:204: rājasās tu rajaḥ-prakṛtīn yakṣān rakṣasāṃś ca yajante |
GE07bhg4c17u:205: etebhyo 'nye vilakṣaṇās tāmasā janās tāmasān eva pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca yajante |
GE07bhg4c17u:208: madhusūdanaḥ : śraddhā jñātā satī niṣṭhāṃ jñāpayiṣyati |
GE07bhg4c17u:209: kenopāyena sā jñāyatām ity apekṣite deva-pūjādikārya-liṅgenānumeyety āha yajanta iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:210: janāḥ śāstrīya-viveka-hīnā ye svābhāvikyā śraddhayā devān vasu-rudrādīn
GE07bhg4c17u:212: ye ca yakṣān kuverādīn rakṣāṃsi ca rākṣasān nirṛti-prabhṛtīn rājasān yajante te 'nye rājasā jñeyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:213_0: ye ca pretān viprādayaḥ svadharmāt pracyutā deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ vāyavīyaṃ deham āpannā
GE07bhg4c17u:213_1: ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā bhavantīti manūktān piśāca-viśeṣān vā bhūta-gaṇāṃś
GE07bhg4c17u:213_2: ca sapta-mātṛkādīṃś ca tāmasān yajante te 'nye tāmasā jñeyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:214: anya iti padaṃ triṣv api vailakṣaṇya-dyotanāya sambadhyate ||4||
GE07bhg4c17u:215: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam arthaṃ spaṣṭayati sāttvikāntaḥ-karaṇāḥ sāttvikyā śraddhayā sāttvika-śāstra-vidhinā sāttvikān devān eva yajante |
GE07bhg4c17u:217: evaṃ rājasā rājasāntaḥ-karaṇā ity ādi vivaritavyam ||4||
GE07bhg4c17u:218: baladevaḥ : kārya-bhedena sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ prapañcayati yajanta iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:219: śāstrīya-viveka-saṃvid-vihīnā ye janāḥ svabhāva-jayā śraddhayā devān sāttvikān vasu-rudrādīn yajante te 'nye rājasāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:223: deha-pātottara-labdha-vāyavīya-dehā ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā manūktāḥ piśāca-viśeṣā veti vyākhyātāraś cāt sapta-mātṛkādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:224: evam ālasyāt tyakta-veda-vidhīnāṃ svabhāvān sāttvikādyā nirūpitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:225: ete ca balavad vaidika-sat-prasaṅgāt svabhāvān vijitya kadācid vede 'py adhikṛto bhavantīti bodhyam ||4||
GE07bhg4c17u:227: aśāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:231: śrīdharaḥ : rājasa-tāmaseṣv api punar viśeṣāntaram āha aśāstra-vihitam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:236: ye punar atyantaṃ manda-bhāgyās te gatānugatyā pāṣaṇḍa-saṅgena ca tad-ācārānuvartinaḥ santo 'śāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:246: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivy-ādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayanto vṛthaiva upavāsādibhiḥ kṛśaṃ kurvanto 'cetaso 'vivekinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:249: evaṃ ye tapaś caranti tān āsura-niścayān |
GE07bhg4c17u:251: madhusūdanaḥ : evam anādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ sattvādi-niṣṭhā kāryato nirṇītā |
GE07bhg4c17u:252: tatra kecid rājasa-tāmasā api prāg-bhavīya-puṇya-paripākāt sāttvikā bhūtvā śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante |
GE07bhg4c17u:254: durdaiva-paripāka-prāpta-durjana-saṅgādi-doṣeṇa ca rājasa-tāmasatāṃ na muñcanti te śāstrīya-mārgād bhraṣṭā asan-mārgānusaraṇeneha loke paratra ca
GE07bhg4c17u:256: aśāstra-vihitaṃ śāstreṇa vedena pratyakṣeṇānumitena vā na vihitam
GE07bhg4c17u:257: aśāstreṇa buddhādy-āgamena bodhitaṃ vā ghoraṃ parasyātmanaḥ pīḍā-karaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:258: tapas tapta-śilā-rohaṇādi tapyante kurvanti ye janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:260: dhārmikatva-khyāpanam ahaṃkāro 'ham eva śreṣṭha iti durabhimānas tābhyāṃ samyag yuktāḥ, yogasya samyaktvam anāyāsena viyoga-jananā-sāmarthyaṃ kāme
GE07bhg4c17u:272: bhoktṛ-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ bhogyasya śarīrasya kṛśīkaraṇena kṛśīkurvanta eva |
GE07bhg4c17u:278: vedārtha-virodhī niścayo yeṣāṃ tān manuṣyatvena pratīyamānān apy
GE07bhg4c17u:281: | asuratva-jāti-rahitānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ karmaṇaivāsuratvāt tān asurān viddhīti sākṣān noktam iti ca draṣṭavyam ||5-6||
GE07bhg4c17u:282: viśvanāthaḥ : yas tvayā pṛṣṭhaṃ ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya
GE07bhg4c17u:283: kāma-bhoga-rahitāḥ śraddhayā yajante teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:284: tasyottaram adhunā śṛṇv ity āha aśāstreti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:285: ghoraṃ prāṇi-bhayaṅkaraṃ tapas tapyante kurvantīty-upalakṣaṇam idaṃ japa-yāgādikam apy aśāstrīyaṃ kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c17u:286: kāmācaraṇa-rāhityaṃ śraddhānvitatvaṃ ca svata eva labhyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:293: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayantaḥ kṛśī-kurvanto māṃ ca mad-aṃśa-bhūtaṃ jīvaṃ ca duḥkhayantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:294: āsūya-niścayān asurāṇām eva niṣṭhāyāṃ sthitām ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:295: baladevaḥ : veda-bāhyānāṃ kadācid api durgater nistāro neti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ dṛḍhayann āha aśāstreti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:297: veda-viruddhena svāgamena vihitaṃ ghoraṃ para-pīḍakaṃ tapo ye tapyante
GE07bhg4c17u:298: kurvanti kāma-rāgo viṣaya-spṛhā balaṃ ca mayā śakyam etat siddhaiḥ kartum iti durāgrahaḥ śarīrastham ārambhakatayā śarīraṃ sthitaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:302: niścayenāsurān viddhīti pūrvoktānāṃ teṣāṃ durgatir avarjanīyaiveti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:306: devān yajatāṃ tu vastutaḥ sāttvikatvāt tad-anugrahe sati śāstrīyā sulabheti sthitam ||5-6||
GE07bhg4c17u:308: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:309: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu ||7||
GE07bhg4c17u:310: śrīdharaḥ : āhārādi-bhedād api sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayitum āha āhāras tv ity ādi-trayodaśabhiḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:311: sarvasyāpi janasya ya āhāro 'nnādi sa tu yathāyathaṃ trividhaḥ priyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:312: tathā yajña-tapo-dānāni ca trividhāni bhavanti teṣāṃ vakṣyamānaṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c17u:314: sattva-vṛddhau yatna-kartavya ity etad arthaṃ kathyate ||7||
GE07bhg4c17u:315: madhusūdanaḥ : ye sāttvikās te devā ye tu rājasās tāmasāś ca te viparyastatvād asurā iti sthite sāttvikānām ādānāya rājasa-tāmasānāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:316: hānāya cāhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ traividhyam āha āhāra iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:318: āhāro 'pi sarvasya priyas trividha eva bhavati sarvasya triguṇātmakatvena caturthyāṃ vidhāyā asaṃbhavāt |
GE07bhg4c17u:319: yathā dṛṣṭārtha āhāras trividhas tathā yajña-tapo-dānānya-dṛṣṭārthāny api trividhāni |
GE07bhg4c17u:320: tatra yajñaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo dravya-devatā-tyāgaḥ iti kalpa-kārair
GE07bhg4c17u:322: sa ca yajatinā juhotinā ca coditatvena yāgo homaś ceti dvividha uttiṣṭhad-dhomā vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntā
GE07bhg4c17u:330: āhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ sāttvika-rājasa-tāmasa-bhedaṃ mayā vyākhyāyamānam imaṃ śṛṇu ||7||
GE07bhg4c17u:331: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ ye śāstra-vidhi-tyāginaḥ kāma-cāreṇa vartante pūrvādhyāyoktā ye cāsminn adhyāye āsura-śāstra-vidhinā
GE07bhg4c17u:332: yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajante, ye cāśāstrīyaṃ tapa-ādikaṃ kurvanti te sarve āsura-sarga-madhya-gatā eva bhavantīti prakaraṇārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:333: tathāpy āhārādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ traividhyāt tadvatāṃ yathā-yogaṃ daivam āsuraṃ ca
GE07bhg4c17u:334: sargaṃ svayam eva vivicya jānīty āha āhāras tv ity ādi trayodaśabhiḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c17u:335: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sthite tad-āhārādīnām api traividhyam āha āhāras tv iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:336: śraddhāvat sarvasya priyo 'nnādir āhāro 'pi trividho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c17u:341: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvika-priyāḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c17u:342: śrīdharaḥ : tatrāhāra-traividhyam āha āyur iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:375: etair liṅgaiḥ sāttvika jñeyāḥ sāttvikatvam abhilaṣadbhiś caita ādeyā ity arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c17u:376: viśvanāthaḥ : sāttvikāhāravatām āyur vardhata iti prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:378: rasyā iti kevala guḍādīnāṃ rasyatve 'pi rūkṣatvam ata āha
GE07bhg4c17u:383: hṛd-udarādy-ahitatvam ata āha hṛdyā hṛd-udara-hitā iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:386: sāttvika-loka-priyā jñeyās teṣāṃ priyatve saty eva sāttvikatvaṃ ca jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c17u:387: kiṃ ca guṇa-catuṣṭayavattve 'pi apāvitrye sati sāttvika-priyatādarśanād
GE07bhg4c17u:388: atra pavitrā ity api viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam |
GE07bhg4c17u:391: baladevaḥ : tatra sāttvikāhāram āha āyuri iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:398: śāli-godhūmādayaḥ sāttvikānāṃ priyās tair upādeyā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:422: madhusūdanaḥ : ati-śabdaḥ kaṭv-ādiṣu saptasv api yojanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:436: etair liṅgaiḥ rājasā jñeyāḥ sāttvikaiś caita upekṣaṇīyā ity arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c17u:437: viśvanāthaḥ : ati-śabdaḥ kaṭv-ādiṣu saptasv api sambadhyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:452: ati-kaṭur iti tikto nimbādir na ca maricādis tasya tīkṣṇa-śabdenokter
GE07bhg4c17u:454: khyāto 'titīkṣṇo marīcy-ādir atirukṣaḥ kaṅgukādir atidāhī rājikādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:459: yāta-yāmaṃ gata-rasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat |
GE07bhg4c17u:462: yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmam |
GE07bhg4c17u:473: yāta-yāmaṃ pakvaṃ sat praharādi-vyavahita-modanādi śaityaṃ prāptam |
GE07bhg4c17u:483: etādṛśaṃ yad bhojanaṃ bhojyaṃ tat tāmasasya priyaṃ sāttvikair atidūrād upekṣaṇīyam ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:504: rājasa-varge dṛṣṭa-virodha-mātraṃ tāmasa-varge tu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-virodha ity atiśayaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c17u:505: viśvanāthaḥ : yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:514: tataś caivaṃ paryālocya sva-hitaiṣibhiḥ sāttvika āhāraḥ sevya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:515: vaiṣṇavais tu so 'pi bhagavad-aniveditas tyājya eva |
GE07bhg4c17u:523: paryuṣitaṃ pūrve 'hni rāddham ucchiṣṭaṃ guror anyeṣāṃ bhuktāvaśiṣṭam amedhyam apavitraṃ kalañjādi |
GE07bhg4c17u:528: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c17u:530: tatra sāttvikaṃ yajñam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:531: phalākāṅkṣā-rahitaiḥ puruṣair vidhinādiṣṭa āvaśyakatayā vihito yo yajña ijyate 'nuṣṭhīyate sa sāttviko yajñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:535: nānyat phalaṃ sādhanīyam ity evaṃ manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c17u:536: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ krama-prāptaṃ trividhaṃ yajñam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:540: jīvanādi-nimitta-saṃyogena coditaḥ sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave pratinidhy-ādy-upādānenāmukhya-kalpenāpy anuṣṭheyo nityaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:541: tatra sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave 'pi pratinidhim upādāyāvaśyaṃ yaṣṭavyam eva
GE07bhg4c17u:544: kāmya-prayoga-vimukhair vidhi-dṛṣṭo yathā-śāstraṃ niścito yo yajña ijyate
GE07bhg4c17u:547: viśvanāthaḥ : atha yajñasya traividhyam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:548: phalākāṅkṣā-rāhitye kathaṃ yajñe pravṛttir ata āha -- yaṣṭavyam eveti |
GE07bhg4c17u:549: svānuṣṭheyatvena śāstroktatvād avaśya-kartavyam etad iti manaḥ samādhāya
GE07bhg4c17u:550: baladevaḥ : atha yajña-traividhyam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:552: phalecchā-śūnyair yo yajña ijyate kriyate vidhi-dṛṣṭo vidhi-vākyāj jātaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:553: nanu phalecchāṃ vinā tatra kathaṃ pravṛttis tatrāha yaṣṭavyam eveti |
GE07bhg4c17u:554: māṃ prati vedenoktatvāt tat yajanam eva kāryaṃ, na tu tena phalaṃ sādhyam iti manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c17u:556: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat |
GE07bhg4c17u:557: ijyate bharata-śreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam ||12||
GE07bhg4c17u:559: phalam abhisandhāyoddiśya tu yad ijyate yajñaḥ kriyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:563: madhusūdanaḥ : phalaṃ kāmyaṃ svargādi abhisandhāyoddiśya na tv
GE07bhg4c17u:570: 'pi pāralaukika-phalānabhisandhāne 'pi dambhārtham eveti vikalpena dvau pakṣau |
GE07bhg4c17u:571: pāralaukika-phalārtham apy aihalaukika-dambhārtham apīti samuccayenaikaḥ pakṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:574: yathā-śāstraṃ yo yajño 'nuṣṭhīyate taṃ yajñaṃ rājasaṃ viddhi hānāya |
GE07bhg4c17u:578: baladevaḥ : phalaṃ svargādikam abhisandhāya yad ijyate dambhārhtaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c17u:583: śrīdharaḥ : tāmasaṃ yajñam āha vidhi-hīnam iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:585: śāstrokta-vidhi-śūnyam asṛṣṭānnaṃ brāhmaṇādibhyo na sṛṣṭaṃ na niṣpāditam
GE07bhg4c17u:589: śraddhā-śūnyaṃ ca yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate kathayanti śiṣṭāḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c17u:590: madhusūdanaḥ : yathā-śāstra-bodhita-viparītam anna-dāna-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca mantra-hīnaṃ yathokta-dakṣiṇā-hīnam ṛtvig-dveṣādinā
GE07bhg4c17u:598: tāmase tv ayathā-śāstrānuṣṭhānān na kim apy apūrvam astīty atiśayaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c17u:600: baladevaḥ : vidhīti asṛṣṭānnam anna-dāna-rahitaṃ mantra-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca hīnena mantraṇopetaṃ śraddhā-virahitaṃ ṛtvig-vidveṣāt ||13||
GE07bhg4c17u:602: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c17u:603: śrīdharaḥ : tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayituṃ prathamaṃ tāvat
GE07bhg4c17u:604: śārīrādi-bhedena tasya traividhyam āha devety ādi tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:607: deva-brāhmaṇādi-pūjanaṃ śaucādikaṃ ca śārīraṃ śarīra-nirvartyaṃ tapa ucyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c17u:609: śārīra-vācika-mānasa-bhedena tasya travidhyam āha tribhiḥ deveti |
GE07bhg4c17u:618: ārjavam akauṭilyaṃ bhāva-saṃśuddhi-śabdena mānase tapasi vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c17u:628: pañcaite tasya hetava iti hi vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c17u:630: viśvanāthaḥ : tapasas traividhyaṃ vadana prathamaṃ sāttvikasya tapasas
GE07bhg4c17u:632: baladevaḥ : krama-prāptasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tasyādau śārīrādi-bhāvena traividhyam āha deveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:641: anudvega-karaṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priya-hitaṃ ca yat |
GE07bhg4c17u:643: śrīdharaḥ : vācikaṃ tapa āha anudvegakaram iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:644: udvegaṃ bhayaṃ na karotīty anudvegakaraṃ vākyam |
GE07bhg4c17u:648: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ vācā nirvartyaṃ tapaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c17u:649: madhusūdanaḥ : anudvega-karaṃ na kasyacid duḥkha-karaṃ, satyaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:651: priyaṃ śrotus tat-kāla-śruti-sukhaṃ hitaṃ pariṇāme sukha-karam |
GE07bhg4c17u:653: anudvega-karatvādi-viśeṣaṇa-catuṣṭayena viśiṣṭaṃ na tv ekenāpi viśeṣaṇena nyūnam |
GE07bhg4c17u:654: yad vākyaṃ yathā śānto bhava vatsa svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ cānutiṣṭha tathā te śreyo bhaviṣyatīty ādi tad vāṅ-mayaṃ vācikaṃ tapaḥ śārīravat |
GE07bhg4c17u:655: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ ca yathā-vidhi vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ tapa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:658: baladevaḥ : anudvegakaram udvegaṃ bhayaṃ kasyāpi yan na karoti |
GE07bhg4c17u:666: bhāva-saṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate ||16||
GE07bhg4c17u:667: śrīdharaḥ : mānasaṃ tapa āha manaḥ-prasāda iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:680: ātma-vinigraha ātmano manaso viśeṣeṇa sarva-vṛtti-nigraho nirodha-samādhir asamprajñātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:684: paraiḥ saha vyavahāra-kāle māyā-rāhityaṃ seti bhāṣyam |
GE07bhg4c17u:695: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:697: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ śarīra-vāṅ-manobhir nirvartyaṃ trividhaṃ tapo
GE07bhg4c17u:699: tasya trividhasyāpi tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedena traividhyam āha śraddhayetyādi-tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:700: tat trividham api tapaḥ parayā śreṣṭhayā śraddhayā phalākāṅkṣā-śūnyair yuktair ekāgra-cittair narais taptaṃ sāttvikaṃ kathayanti ||17||
GE07bhg4c17u:701: madhusūdanaḥ : śārīra-vācika-mānasa-bhedena trividhasyoktasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedena traividhyam idānīṃ darśayati śraddhayeti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:702: tat-pūrvoktaṃ trividhaṃ śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca tapaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:704: phalābhisandhi-śūnyair yuktaiḥ samāhitaiḥ siddhy-asiddhyor nirvikārair narair adhikāribhis taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ sāttvikaṃ paricakṣate śiṣṭāḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c17u:706: baladevaḥ : uktasya tapasaḥ sāttvikāditayā traividhyam āha śraddhayeti-tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:708: yuktair ekāgra-cittair narair parayā śraddhayā taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ sāttvikam
GE07bhg4c17u:711: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam ||18||
GE07bhg4c17u:717: etad-arthaṃ dambhena ca yat tapaḥ kriyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:720: yad evambhūtaṃ tapas tad iha rājasaṃ proktam ||18||
GE07bhg4c17u:721: madhusūdanaḥ : satkāraḥ sādhur ayaṃ tapasvī brāhmaṇa ity evam avivekibhiḥ kriyamāṇā stutiḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:726: dharma-dhvajitvenaiva ca na tv āstikya-buddhyā yat tapaḥ kriyate tad rājasaṃ proktaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:727: ihāsminn eva loke phaladaṃ na pāralaukikaṃ calam
GE07bhg4c17u:730: viśvanāthaḥ : sat-kāraḥ sādhur ayam ity anyaḥ kartavyā vāk-pūjā |
GE07bhg4c17u:731: mānaḥ pratutthānābhivādanādibhir anyaiḥ kartavyā daihikī pūjā |
GE07bhg4c17u:732: pūjā anyair dīyamānair dhanādibhir bhāvinī vā mānasī pūjā tad artham |
GE07bhg4c17u:733: dambhena ca yat kriyate tad rājasaṃ tapaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:737: baladevaḥ : sat-kāraḥ sādhur ayaṃ tapasvīti stutiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:739: pūjā caraṇa-prakṣālana-dhan-dānadis tad-arthaṃ yat tapo dambhena
GE07bhg4c17u:750: parasyotsādanārthaṃ vā anyasya vināśārtham abhicāra-rūpaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtaṃ kathitam ||19||
GE07bhg4c17u:752: dehendriya-saṃghātasya pīḍayā yat tapaḥ kriyate parasyotsādanārthaṃ vānyasya vināśārtham abhicāra-rūpaṃ vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c17u:756: ca yat tapaḥ parasyotsādanārthaṃ vināśāya vā kriyate tat tāmasam ||19||
GE07bhg4c17u:759: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam ||20||
GE07bhg4c17u:760: śrīdharaḥ : pūrvaṃ pratijñātam eva dānasya traividhyam āha dātavyam iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:761: dātavyam evety evaṃ niścayena yad dānaṃ dīyate 'nupakāriṇe
GE07bhg4c17u:772: tasmai yad evambhūtaṃ dānaṃ tat sāttvikam ||20||
GE07bhg4c17u:773: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ krama-prāptasya dānasya traividhyaṃ darśayati
GE07bhg4c17u:775: dātavyam eva śāstra-condanā-vaśād ity evaṃ niścayena na tu phalābhisandhinā yad dānaṃ tulā-puruṣādi
GE07bhg4c17u:777: deśe puṇye kurukṣetrādau kāle ca puṇye sūryoparāgādau |
GE07bhg4c17u:781: vidyā-tapobhyām ātmano dātuś ca pālana-kṣama eva pratigṛhṇīyād iti śāstrāt
GE07bhg4c17u:785: baladevaḥ : atha dānasya traividhyam āha dātavyam iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:786: niścayena yad dānam anupakāriṇe pātre vidyā-tapobhyāṃ dātū rakṣakāya brāhmaṇāya yad dīyate tad dānaṃ sāttvikam |
GE07bhg4c17u:790: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:791: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam ||21||
GE07bhg4c17u:792: śrīdharaḥ : rājasaṃ dānam āha yad iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:793_0: kālāntare 'yaṃ māṃ pratyupakariṣyatīty evam arthaṃ phalaṃ vā svargādikam uddiśya
GE07bhg4c17u:793_1: yat punar dānaṃ dīyate parikliṣṭaṃ citta-kleśa-yuktaṃ yathā bhavati evambhūtaṃ tad
GE07bhg4c17u:793_2: dānaṃ rājasam udāhṛtam madhusūdanaḥ : pratyupakārārthaṃ kālāntare mām ayaṃ upakariṣyatīty
GE07bhg4c17u:794_0: dṛṣṭārthaṃ phalaṃ vā svargādikam uddiśya yat punar dānaṃ sāttvika-vilakṣaṇaṃ dīyate
GE07bhg4c17u:794_1: parikliṣṭaṃ ca katham etāvad vyayitam iti paścāt tāpa-yuktaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c17u:796: viśvanāthaḥ : para-kliṣṭaṃ katham etāvad vyayitam iti paścāt-tāpa-yuktam |
GE07bhg4c17u:797: yad vā ditsāyāṃ abhāve 'pi gurv-ādyājñānrodha-vaśād eva dattam |
GE07bhg4c17u:799: baladevaḥ : yat tu pratupakārārthaṃ dṛṣṭa-phalārthaṃ phalaṃ vā svargādikam
GE07bhg4c17u:800: adṛṣṭam uddiśyānusandhāya dīyate tad dānaṃ rājasam |
GE07bhg4c17u:801: parikliṣṭaṃ katham etāvad vyayitavyam iti paścāt-tāpa-yuktaṃ yathā syāt tathā
GE07bhg4c17u:802: guru-vākyānurodhād vā yad dīyate tad rājasam ||21||
GE07bhg4c17u:804: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:815: madhusūdanaḥ : adeśe svato durjana-saṃsargād vā pāpa-hetāv aśuci-sthāne |
GE07bhg4c17u:818: apātrebhyaś ca vidyā-tapo-rahitebhyo naṭa-viṭādibhyo yad dānaṃ dīyate
GE07bhg4c17u:821: pātra-paribhava-yuktaṃ ca tad dānaṃ tāmasam udāhṛtam ||22||
GE07bhg4c17u:825: yad apātrebhyo naṭādibhyo dīyate, deśādi-sampattāv api yad asatkṛtaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:827: tūṅkārādy-anādara-bhāṣaṇopetaṃ ca yad dānaṃ tat tāmasam ||22||
GE07bhg4c17u:829: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:830: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā ||23||
GE07bhg4c17u:833: śrīdharaḥ : nanv evaṃ vicāryamāṇe sarvam api yajña-tapo-dānādi
GE07bhg4c17u:834: rājasa-tāmasa-prāyam eveti vyartho yajñādi-prayāsa ity āśaṅkya tathāvidhasyāpi sāttvikatvopapādanāt prakāraṃ darśayitum āha om iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:835: oṃ tat sad iti trividho brahmaṇaḥ paramātmano nirdeśo nāma-vyapadeśaḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:836: tatra tāvad om iti brahma ity ādi śruti-prasiddher om iti brahmaṇo nāma |
GE07bhg4c17u:840: sad eva saumyedam agra āsīt ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:841: ayaṃ trividho 'pi nāma nirdeśena brāhmaṇāś ca vedāś ca yajñāś purā sṛṣṭy-ādau vihitā vidhātrā nirmitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:843: yathā yasyāyaṃ trividho nirdeśas tena paramātmanā brāhmaṇādayaḥ pavitratamāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:844: tasmāt tasyāyaṃ trividho nirdeśo 'tipraśasta ity arthaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c17u:845: idānīṃ pratyekam oṅkārādīnāṃ prāśastyaṃ darśayiṣyann oṅkārasya tad evāha tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:846: yasmād evaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśaḥ praśastas tasmād om ity udāhṛtya uccārya kṛtā veda-vādināṃ yajñādyāḥ śāstroktāḥ kriyāḥ satataṃ sarvadā aṅga-vaikalye 'pi prakarṣeṇa vartante |
GE07bhg4c17u:849: sāttvikāni tāny ādeyāni rājasa-tāmasāni tu parihartavyānīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c17u:851: yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ tv adṛṣṭārthānām aṅga-vaiguṇyād apūrvānutpattau phalābhāvaḥ syād iti sāttvikānī̀am api teṣām ānarthakyaṃ prāptaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:852: pramāda-bahulatvād anuṣṭhātṝṇām atas tad-vaiguṇya-parihārārya oṃ tat sad
GE07bhg4c17u:858: trividhas tisro vidhā avayavā yasya sa trividhaḥ smṛto vedānta-vidbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:860: yasmāt pūrvair maharṣibhir ayaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśaḥ smṛtas tasmād idānīntanair api smartavya iti vidhir atra kalpyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:862: prathama-bhakṣa ity ādiṣv iva vacanāni tv apūrvatvād iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c17u:863: yajña-dāna-tapaḥ-kriyā-saṃyogāc cāsya tad avaiguṇyam eva phalaṃ ṣṭāśva-dagdha-ratha-vat-parasparākāṅkṣayā kalpyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:865: smaraṇād eva tad viṣṇoḥ sampūrṇaṃ syād iti śrutiḥ ||
GE07bhg4c17u:870: brāhmaṇādyāḥ kartāro vedāḥ karaṇāni yajñāḥ karmāṇi tena brahmaṇo nirdeśena karaṇa-bhūtena purā vihitāḥ prajāpatinā |
GE07bhg4c17u:875: oṃkāra-tac-chabda-sac-chabda-vyākhyānena tat-samudāya-rūpaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśaṃ stuty-atiśayāya vyākhyātum ārabhate caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:876: tatra prathamam oṃkāraṃ vyācaṣṭe tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:877: yasmād om iti brahma ity ādiṣu śrutiṣv om iti brahmaṇo nāma prasiddhaṃ tasmād om ity udāhṛtyoṃkāroccāraṇānantaraṃ vidhānoktā vidhi-śāstra-bodhitā brahma-vādināṃ veda-vādināṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:880: yasyaikāvayavoccāraṇād apy avaiguṇyaṃ kiṃ punas tasya sarvasyoccāraṇād iti stuty-atiśayaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:881: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ tapo-yajñādīnāṃ traividhyaṃ sāmānyato manuṣya-mātram adhikṛtyoktam
GE07bhg4c17u:882: tatra ye sāttvikeṣv api madhye brahma-vādinas teṣāṃ tu brahma-nirdeśa-pūrvakā eva yajñādayo
GE07bhg4c17u:883: āha oṃ tat sad ity evaṃ brahmaṇo nirdeśo nāmnā vyapadeśaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:885: tatra om iti sarva-śrutiṣu prasiddham eva brahmaṇo nāma |
GE07bhg4c17u:886: jagat-kāraṇatvenātiprasiddher atan-nirasanena ca prasiddhes tad iti ca |
GE07bhg4c17u:887: sad eva saumyedam agra āsīt iti śruteḥ sad iti ca |
GE07bhg4c17u:889: śabda-vācyena brahmaṇaiva brāhmaṇā vedā yajñāś ca vihitāḥ kṛtās tasmāt om
GE07bhg4c17u:890: iti brahmaṇo nāmodāhṛtyoccārya vartamānānāṃ brahma-vādināṃ yajñādayaḥ pravartante ||23-24||
GE07bhg4c17u:892: sāttvikānāṃ teṣām upadeyatvaṃ, rājasādīnāṃ heyatvaṃ ca darśitam |
GE07bhg4c17u:893: atha sāttvikādhikāriṇāṃ yajñādīni viṣṇu-nāma-pūrvakāṇy evabhavantīty ucyate om iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:895: om ity ādikas trividho brahmaṇo viṣṇor nirdeśo nāma-dheyaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:896: om ity etad brahmaṇo nediṣṭaṃ nāma iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:898: | tat tvam asi iti śruteḥ tad iti dvitīyaṃ nāma |
GE07bhg4c17u:899: sad eva saumya iti śruteḥ sad iti tṛtīyaṃ nāma |
GE07bhg4c17u:901: viṣṇv-ādi-nāmnāṃ tena trividhena nirdeśena brāhmaṇā vedā yajñāś ca purā caturmukhena vihitāḥ prakaṭitās tasmān mahā-prabhāvo 'yaṃ nirdeśas tat-pūrvakāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:904: yasmād evaṃ tasmād om iti nirdeśam udāhṛtyoccāryānuṣṭhitā brahma-vādināṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:911: śrīdharaḥ : dvitīyaṃ nāma prastautīti tad iti tad ity udāhṛtya iti
GE07bhg4c17u:914: puruṣaiḥ phalābhisandhim akṛtvā yajñādyāḥ kriyāḥ kriyante |
GE07bhg4c17u:918: madhusūdanaḥ : dvitīyaṃ tac-chabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe tad iti |
GE07bhg4c17u:920_0: ādi-śruti-prasiddhaṃ tad iti brahmaṇo nāmodāhṛtya phalam anabhisandhāyāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhy-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:920_1: yajña-tapaḥ-kriyā dāna-kriyāś ca vividhā mokṣa-kāṅkṣibhiḥ kriyante tasmād atipraśastam
GE07bhg4c17u:920_2: etat viśvanāthaḥ : tad ity udāhṛtyeti pūrvasyānuṣaṅgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:922: baladevaḥ : tad iti nirdeśam udāhṛtya phalam anabhisandhāya yajñādī-kriyā
GE07bhg4c17u:927: sad-bhāve sādhu-bhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:928: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sac-chabdaḥ pārtha yujyate ||26||
GE07bhg4c17u:929: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:930: karma caiva tad-arthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate ||27||
GE07bhg4c17u:931: śrīdharaḥ : sac-chabdasya prāśastyam āha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:935: deva-dattasya putrādi śreṣī̀oham ity asminn arthe |
GE07bhg4c17u:937: praśaste māṅgalike vivāhādi-karmaṇi ca sad idaṃ karmeti sac-chabdo yujyate prayujyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:940: yajñādiṣu ca yā sthitis tātparyenāvasthānaṃ tad api sad ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:941: yasya cedaṃ nāma-trayaṃ sa eva paramātmā arthaḥ phalaṃ yasya
GE07bhg4c17u:946: tac cātivyavahitam api sad ity evābhidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:948: nāma-trayaṃ tasmād etat sarva-karma-sādguṇyārthaṃ kīrayed iti tātparyārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:951: apare tu pravartante vidhinoktāḥ kriyante mokṣa-kāṅkṣibhiḥ ity ādi vartamānopadeśaḥ samidhā yajatīty ādivad
GE07bhg4c17u:953: tat tu sad-bhāve sādhu-bhāve cety ādiṣu prāptārthatvān na saṅgacchata iti pūrvokta-krameṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:955: madhusūdanaḥ : tṛtīyaṃ sac-cabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:956: sad eva somyedam agra āsīt ity ādi-śruti-prasiddhaṃ sad ity etad brahmaṇo nāma sad-bhāve 'vidyamānatva-śaṅkāyāṃ vidyamānatve sādhu-bhāve
GE07bhg4c17u:959: vaiguṇya-parihāreṇa yajñādeḥ sādhutvaṃ tat-phalasya ca vidyamānatvaṃ kartuṃ kṣamam etad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:960: tathā sad-bhāva-sādhu-bhāvayor iva praśaste 'pratibandhenāśu-sukha-janake māṅgalike karmaṇi
GE07bhg4c17u:963: apratibandhenāśu-phala-janakatvaṃ vaiguṇya-parihāreṇa yajñādeḥ samartham etan nāmeti praśastataram etad ity arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c17u:964: yajñe tapasi dāne ca yā sthitis tat-paratayāvasthitir niṣṭhā sāpi sad ity ucyate vidvadbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:966: artheṣu bhavaṃ tad-anukūlam eva ca karma tad-arthīyaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:967: bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇaṃ karma vā tad-arthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:971: tat-samudāyasya oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśasya māhātmyam iti saṃpiṇḍitārthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c17u:972: viśvanāthaḥ : brahma-vācakaḥ sac-chabdaḥ praśasteṣv api vartate |
GE07bhg4c17u:974: praśasta-mātre karmaṇi prākṛte 'prākṛte 'pi sac-chabdaḥ prayoktavya ity āśayenāha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:978: tad-arthīyaṃ karma brahmacaryopayogi yat karma bhagavan-mandira-mārjanādikam tad api ||26-27||
GE07bhg4c17u:979: baladevaḥ : sad iti nirdeśaḥ praśasteṣv arthāntareṣu vartate tasmāt praśaste karma-mātre sa prayojya iti bhāvenāha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c17u:981: sac-chabdaḥ prayujyate sad eva saumya ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c17u:983: tathā praśaste upanayana-vivāhādike ca māṅgalike karmaṇi sac-chabdo
GE07bhg4c17u:985: yajñādau yā teṣāṃ sthitis tātparyeṇāvasthitis tad api sad ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:986: yasyedaṃ nāma-trayaṃ tad-arthīyaṃ karma ca tan-mandira-nirmāṇa-tad-vimārjanādi sad ity abhidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:987: atra trividho 'yaṃ nirdeśaḥ smartavya iti vidhiḥ kalpyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:988: vaṣaṭ-kartuḥ prathamaṃ bhakṣyaḥ ity ādāv iva vacanāni tv apūrvatvād iti nyāyād
GE07bhg4c17u:991: smaraṇād eva tad viṣṇoḥ sampūrṇaṃ syād iti śrutiḥ || iti smaraṇāc ca
GE07bhg4c17u:993: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat |
GE07bhg4c17u:994: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha ||28||
GE07bhg4c17u:995: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sarva-karmasu śraddhayaiva praṛtty-artham aśraddhayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ nindati aśraddhayeti |
GE07bhg4c17u:1000: tat sarvam asad ity ucyate yatas tat pretya lokāntare na phalati viguṇatvāt |
GE07bhg4c17u:1001: no iha na ca asmin loke phalati ayaśaskatvāt |
GE07bhg4c17u:1006: madhusūdanaḥ : yady ālasyādinā śāstrīyaṃ vidhim utsṛjya śraddadhānatayaiva
GE07bhg4c17u:1008: prāpta oṃ tat sad iti brahma-nirdeśena tat-parihāras tarhy aśraddadhānatayā śāstrīyaṃ vidhim utsṛjya kāma-kāreṇa yat kiṃcid yajñādi
GE07bhg4c17u:1009: kurvatām asurāṇām api tenaiva vaiguṇya-parihāraḥ syād iti kṛtaṃ śraddhayā
GE07bhg4c17u:1011: aśraddhayā yad dhutaṃ havanaṃ kṛtam agnau dattaṃ yad brāhmaṇebhyo yat tapas taptaṃ yac cānyat karma kṛtaṃ stuti-namaskārādi tat sarvam aśraddhayā kṛtam asad asādhv ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:1012: ata eva oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśena na tasya sādhu-bhāvaḥ śakyate kartuṃ sarvathā tad-ayogyatvāc chilāyā ivāṅkuraḥ |
GE07bhg4c17u:1013: tat kasmād asad ity ucyate śṛṇu he pārtha |
GE07bhg4c17u:1016: tad-aśraddhākṛtaṃ na pretya para-loke phalati viguṇatvenāpūrvājanakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c17u:1017: no iha nāpīha loke yaśaḥ sādhubhir ninditatvāt |
GE07bhg4c17u:1019: aihikāmuṣmika-phala-vikalatvād aśraddhā-kṛtasya sāttvikyā śraddhayaiva sāttvikaṃ yajñādi kuryād antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhaye |
GE07bhg4c17u:1021: śraddhā-pūrvakasya sāttvikasya yajñāder daivād vaiguṇya-śaṅkāyāṃ brahmaṇo
GE07bhg4c17u:1024: asāttvikam api yajñādi viguṇaṃ brahmaṇo nāma-nirdeśena sāttvikaṃ sa-guṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:1026: tad evam asminn adhyāya ālasyādinānādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ śraddhā-pūrvakaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:1028: śraddhā-pūrvakānuṣṭhānena ca deva-sādharmyeṇa kim asurā amī devā vety arjuna-saṃśaya-viṣayāṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:1032: bhagavatā nirṇayaḥ kṛta iti siddham ||28|| iti
GE07bhg4c17u:1037: tathāsat karma kim ity apekṣāyām āha aśraddayeti |
GE07bhg4c17u:1041: yad anyac cāpi karma kṛtaṃ tat sarvam asad iti hutam apy ahutam eva |
GE07bhg4c17u:1043: tapo 'py ataptam eva kṛtam apy akṛtam eva |
GE07bhg4c17u:1044: yatas tat na pretya na para-loke phalati nāpīha-loke phalati ||28||
GE07bhg4c17u:1045: ukteṣu vividheṣv eva sāttvikaṃ śraddhayā kṛtam |
GE07bhg4c17u:1046: yat syāt tad eva mokṣārham ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c17u:1048: gītāsv ayaṃ saptadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||
GE07bhg4c17u:1049: baladevaḥ : atha sāttvikyā śraddhayā sarveṣu karmasu pravartitavyam |
GE07bhg4c17u:1050: tayā vinā sarvaṃ vyartham iti nindati aśraddhayeti |
GE07bhg4c17u:1053: taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ yac cānyad api stuti-praṇaty-ādi-karma kṛtaṃ, tat sarvam asan nindyam ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c17u:1056: yato 'śraddhayā kṛtaṃ, tat pretya para-loke na phalati viguṇāt tasmāt pūrvānutpatter nāpīha loke kīrtiḥ sadbhir ninditatvāt ||28||
GE07bhg4c17u:1057: śraddhāṃ svabhāvajāṃ hitvā śāstrajāṃ tāṃ samāśritaḥ |
